activities:
Luckie & Company (and Integrative Logic, a division of Luckie) is a data processor that provides data analytic services to entities, including entities located in the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland.  These entities send data, including personal information, about their own customers or end users to Luckie & Company for analysis.  Luckie & Company aggregates, analyzes, and matches this data against other information (like demographic information), sometimes from third parties, to help its customers understand their own customers or end users better.  Luckie & Company provides hosting services for websites operated and managed by its customers, that at times may involve access to or processing of the data that its customers collect and/or store about their own customers or end users. 

Luckie & Company also processes human resources data for employees at Luckie Europe, a UK Company subsidiary of Luckie & Company.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organizational data, pharmaceutical data, end user and/or customer data, patient data, web analytics data and human resources data.
recoursemech: American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program).
